.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.4 (2016-12-29)
---------------------

* Support for CC environment variable at build time

0.1.3 (2015-03-22)
---------------------

* Python 3 Support

0.1.2dev (2014-05-27)
---------------------

* Log handler
* "fbt" decorator
* tests

0.1.1dev (2014-05-27)
---------------------

* Metadata fixes

0.1.0dev (2014-05-22)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
